oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Souvenir Folder of Memphis, Tennessee" Postcard Collection
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Exterior Side One: "Souvenir Folder of Memphis, Tennessee -- 'Down in Dixie' -- Cotton and Lumber -- Hotel Peabody -- 'South's Finest One of America's Best.' -- Museum of Natural History"; Exterior Side Two: "Mississippi River from Arkansas Side -- Sterick Building -- New Cotton Exchange Bldg. -- Columbian Mutual Tower"

Interior: "Memphis, Down-In-Dixie Welcomes You" text; "Claridge Hotel" image; "Japanese Garden, Overton Park" image; "Parkview Hotel" image; "Methodist Hospital" image; "Confederate Park, Post Office and Mississippi River by moonlight" image; "Levee Scene and Water Front" image; "Administration Building, State Teachers College" image; "Bear Pit, Overton Park" image; "Forest [sic] Park Monument" image; "Sunken Garden and Entrance to Morningside Park on Speedway" image; "Cossitt Library and Custom House" image; "Union Station" image; "Busy Scene on Levee Front" image; "Bank of Commerce and Trust Company" image; "Shrine Building" image; "Baptist Hospital and Physicians' and Surgeons' Bldg." image; "Shelby County Court House" image; "Municipal Swimming Pool" image; "Elk's Club and Hotel, Overlooking Mississippi River" image; "Southwestern, the College of Mississippi Valley" image; "Dough Boy Statue, Overton Park" image; "The Pink Palace, Chickasaw Gardens" image; "River Front" image; "Court Square Looking North, Showing Columbia Mutual Tower" image; "Grand Central Station" image; "Memphis and Harrihan [sic] Bridges, Spanning Mississippi River" image; "Hello Dear, We are in Memphis and it is just 10 o'clock. Hope you enjoyed the rain that we did last night. Driving has been less tiresome & cooler today. We expect to get pretty well into Texas tonight. Will write a letter from there. -- Lots of love, Margaret" handwritten note;
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: buildings; hotels; hospitals; parks; riverfront; bridges;
